translation: I received orders from His Excellency Mr. Bento Manuel Ribeiro, verbally, to send the prisoner Sezefredo Nunes to the brigade of Your Excellency Captain Fortunato Francisco da Silva to carry out his duties with the forces of the 2nd and 3rd districts, appointed by Your Excellency Brigadier Bento Manuel to go to the province of Corrientes to discuss political matters with Lope Chico. The same captain reports that there are 50 horses of his order waiting for orders from Your Excellency.
